document_type.description: Type of document (Memo, Dispatch, Cable, Report, etc.).

classification.description: The category the document belongs to (Oswald, Commission, Soviet, Administrative, Cuba, Liaison, Personnel, Operations, Mexico, Security, etc.).

date.description: The date when the document was created. (YYYY-MM-DD format)

origin_agency.description: Agency or department that originated the document.

sender.description: Author or sending office of the document.

recipient.description: Intended recipient or receiving office of the document.

persons_mentioned.description: Key individuals referenced in the document.

locations_mentioned.description: Geographic locations referenced in the document.

tags.description: Additional searchable terms related to the document.
